title: I cant download lol please help me !
body: I cant download lol error  : Source file not found C:/Users/**/AppData/Roaming/RiotGames/League of Legends 4.2.1/install/disk1.cab that the file exists and that you can access it please help me :(

replies.body:
If you're getting this error when you're downloading League for the first time, it sounds like your network connection might be unstable. If you have a break in your connection while downloading the game files there's a chance something got lost which is preventing the game from installing correctly. 

Look through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check that you're downloading all the files properly.
